channel.title: Liza's blog
channel.description: Musings on data analysis, statistics education and more.

item.title: My first Statistical Society of Canada Annual Meeting
item.dc:creator: Liza Bolton
item.description: Notes and links from SSC2021. I often find I get the most from conferences if I take notes with the vague notion of sharing them. So this is mostly for me, but I hope it might be of interest to others, too. Note: This post will be updated sporadically.
